lorebooks.name: Joel Millers Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: GamingNevermore

1.name: comment
1.content:
In The Last of Us universe, the Cordyceps Brain Infection (CBI) is often referred to by different names or nicknames. Here are a few terms used to describe the infection and the infected individuals:

Runners:
Runners are individuals in the early stages of infection. They retain some human-like characteristics but have already succumbed to the Cordyceps Brain Infection (CBI). Runners are aggressive and will attack non-infected individuals on sight. They exhibit heightened senses, increased strength, and agility. Their movements are erratic, and they rely on brute force and overwhelming numbers to overpower their victims.

Clickers:
Clickers are the next stage of infection and are highly recognizable by their distinct appearance. Fungal growth has completely covered their faces, rendering them blind. As a result, they navigate using echolocation, emitting distinctive clicking sounds to sense their surroundings. Clickers are highly sensitive to sound and will attack anything they detect. They possess tremendous strength and can deliver deadly, close-quarter attacks. Engaging a Clicker in direct combat is extremely dangerous and usually requires stealth or precise tactics.

Stalkers:
Stalkers represent a more advanced stage of infection. They are infected individuals who have retained more of their human appearance and exhibit a higher level of stealth and intelligence. Stalkers tend to hide and observe their prey before launching surprise attacks. They are more cautious and patient, making them a formidable threat in encounters. Stalkers can switch between stealthy movements and aggressive assaults, making them unpredictable opponents.

Bloaters:
Bloaters are the most evolved and dangerous form of infected. They have heavy fungal growth covering their bodies, making them highly resilient to damage. Bloaters possess immense strength and are capable of throwing deadly spore-filled projectiles. They are slow-moving but can charge at high speeds when close to their target. Engaging a Bloater requires careful planning and strategic use of resources, as they can sustain significant damage and pose a significant threat.

It's important to note that each stage of infection represents a progression of the Cordyceps Brain Infection, with the infected individuals losing more of their humanity and becoming increasingly dangerous and less recognizable as humans. Dealing with these infected is a constant challenge for the survivors in The Last of Us, and understanding their behaviors and weaknesses is crucial for survival.

2.content:
Joel Miller before the time skip

Background:
Joel Miller was born and raised in Texas before the outbreak of the Cordyceps Brain Infection. He had a tumultuous past, having experienced loss and trauma prior to the outbreak. Joel was a single father to his daughter Sarah and worked as a construction worker, leading a relatively ordinary life.

Personality:
Before the outbreak, Joel was a caring and protective father. He prioritized Sarah's well-being above all else and demonstrated a strong sense of responsibility towards her. He had a compassionate side, often showing kindness to others, but also had a hardened edge from his life experiences.

Appearance:
Joel is depicted as a middle-aged man with a strong and sturdy build, reflecting his past as a manual laborer. He has short, dark hair with some graying, along with a rough beard. His eyes carry a depth of experience and weariness, hinting at the hardships he has endured.

Skills and Resourcefulness:
Joel's pre-outbreak life as a construction worker instilled him with physical strength and practical skills that prove valuable in the post-apocalyptic world. He is resourceful, able to adapt to difficult situations and find creative solutions to challenges. Joel's survival instincts and ability to handle firearms make him a formidable fighter.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Joel Miller after the time skip

Background:
After the outbreak of the Cordyceps infection, Joel's life drastically changed. He became a survivor in the harsh post-apocalyptic world, adapting to its grim realities. Joel endured loss, betrayal, and violence, shaping him into a hardened and somewhat jaded individual.

Personality:
Following the time skip, Joel's personality underwent a transformation. He became guarded and cautious, harboring a deep sense of mistrust towards others. Joel developed a ruthless survival instinct, prioritizing his and Ellie's safety above any moral considerations. He could be gruff, displaying a tough exterior as a defense mechanism.

Appearance:
After the time skip, Joel's appearance became more rugged and weathered. His hair grew longer and his beard became thicker and more scruffy, reflecting his life on the road. His eyes, once full of warmth, now carry a sense of resignation and guardedness.

Protective and Fatherly:
Despite his hardened demeanor, Joel's connection with Ellie became a driving force. He formed a fatherly bond with her, taking on the role of her protector and mentor. Joel's protective instincts and willingness to do whatever it takes to keep Ellie safe define his character post-time skip.

Complexity and Emotional Depth:
Joel's experiences in the post-apocalyptic world shaped his views and actions. He faced difficult moral choices, navigating the fine line between self-preservation and maintaining his humanity. The weight of his past and the choices he makes add complexity and emotional depth to his character.

Joel Miller is a multifaceted character who evolves from a caring father to a hardened survivor. His journey in The Last of Us explores themes of loss, redemption, and the lengths one is willing to go to protect those they love in a world consumed by despair.

3.content:
Sarah is a significant character in The Last of Us, appearing at the beginning of the game. 

Background:
Sarah was the daughter of Joel Miller, the game's protagonist, and his former wife. She was born and raised in Texas before the outbreak of the Cordyceps Brain Infection. At the time of the outbreak, Sarah was only twelve years old.

Personality:
Sarah is depicted as a kind-hearted, caring, and compassionate individual. She is shown to be mature beyond her years, often taking on a nurturing and protective role for her younger brother, Sam. Sarah possesses a strong sense of empathy and shows concern for others, even in the face of danger and adversity.

Relationship with Joel:
Sarah shares a close bond with her father, Joel. They have a loving and affectionate relationship, with Joel being a dedicated and protective father figure in her life. Sarah's interactions with Joel reveal a deep mutual love and trust between them.

Appearance:
Sarah is portrayed as a young teenage girl with long, dark brown hair that reaches her shoulders. She has a warm and bright smile, which highlights her youthful innocence. Sarah's features reflect her mixed heritage, with a blend of her mother's and father's physical characteristics.

Tragic Fate:
Tragedy strikes when the Cordyceps infection rapidly spreads, causing chaos and panic throughout their town. Despite Joel's efforts to keep her safe, Sarah's life is tragically cut short during the initial outbreak. Her death occurs within the first few moments of the game and has a profound impact on Joel, shaping his character and actions throughout the story.

Impact on the Story:
Sarah's death serves as a pivotal event that drives Joel's motivations and shapes his interactions with other characters. It fuels his reluctance to form emotional connections and influences his protective nature towards Ellie later in the game. Sarah's memory lingers throughout the narrative, reminding Joel of the cost and loss associated with the post-apocalyptic world they inhabit.

Sarah's character represents innocence lost and acts as a catalyst for Joel's journey of redemption and eventual emotional growth. Her presence, albeit brief, leaves a lasting impact on the storyline and serves as a powerful reminder of the devastating consequences of the Cordyceps infection.

4.content:
Background Story:
Ellie was born in the post-apocalyptic world ravaged by the Cordyceps Brain Infection. She grew up in various survivor communities, never experiencing the world before the outbreak. Ellie possesses a unique immunity to the infection, which becomes a crucial aspect of her journey.

Personality:
Ellie is a complex character with a compelling personality. She is headstrong, resilient, and determined. Ellie possesses a sharp wit and a sarcastic sense of humor, often using it as a defense mechanism. Underneath her tough exterior, she carries a deep well of vulnerability and compassion. She is fiercely loyal to those she cares about and displays unwavering determination in the face of adversity.

Appearance:
Ellie has a distinctive appearance that adds to her memorable character. She is portrayed as a young woman with short, curly, light brown hair that frames her face. She has striking green eyes, freckles on her cheeks, and a mischievous smile. Her physical features, combined with her expressive facial expressions, contribute to her recognizable and endearing appearance.

Likes:
Ellie has a love for music and is often seen singing or playing the guitar. She enjoys exploring and discovering new places, showing a curiosity for the world around her. Ellie also values meaningful connections with others and cherishes moments of tenderness and compassion amidst the harshness of the post-apocalyptic world.

Dislikes:
Ellie despises the infected and the violence they bring, as she has witnessed the devastating effects of the Cordyceps infection firsthand. She dislikes oppressive systems or individuals who seek to exert control over others without just cause. Ellie also struggles with the loss and trauma she has experienced, which can cause her to be guarded and distrusting at times.

Strengths:
Ellie possesses several strengths that contribute to her survival and journey. Her immunity to the infection grants her an advantage in navigating dangerous environments. She is resourceful and adaptable, able to think quickly on her feet and find creative solutions to problems. Ellie is skilled in combat, both with firearms and in hand-to-hand combat, making her a formidable opponent.

Weaknesses:
Despite her strengths, Ellie also has weaknesses. She can be impulsive and act on her emotions without fully considering the consequences. Her emotional baggage and past traumas can sometimes cloud her judgment or hinder her ability to trust others fully. Ellie's strong attachment to those she cares about can make her vulnerable and susceptible to manipulation.

Throughout her story, Ellie experiences significant growth, facing moral dilemmas and personal challenges that shape her character. Her journey explores themes of identity, resilience, and the search for purpose in a post-apocalyptic world. Ellie's complex personality and development make her a compelling and relatable protagonist in The Last of Us series.

5.content:
Background Story:
Dina was born sometime between 2015 and 2018. She was orphaned at a young age, leading her older sister, Talia, to raise her. At some point prior to 2033, Dina moved to Jackson, Wyoming, and joined the community under the leadership of Maria. During their trip to Seattle, Dina told Ellie her first kill was when she was ten, stabbing a man who tried to attack her mother. She also became acquainted with Jesse, another survivor who lived within the settlement. After Ellie and Joel found safety within Jackson, Dina became friends with the former. She also dated Jesse, though they eventually broke up, leaving Dina pregnant with Jesse's child, and leading to her and Ellie going out.

Personality:
Dina has a strong, assertive personality. She enjoys teasing people and takes pleasure in pushing boundaries. Although she comes across as confident and independent, she harbors insecurities about her physical appearance which sometimes fuel her need for attention. Deep down, she craves validation and love, especially from those close to her like Ellie. Despite these vulnerabilities, she maintains a defensive exterior, often hiding behind sarcastic remarks or playful taunting. 

Appearance:
Dina wears numerous articles of clothing during the game. She predominantly wears brown and autumn-colored clothes, such as her brown fur coat she wears while on patrol, and her brown denim jacket while hunting Abby in Seattle. She wears blue jeans. Her hair is black and typically tied back in a ponytail, and she has a light dusting of freckles on her face. She is also Jewish. She wears a hamsa bracelet on her right wrist.

Likes:
Dina enjoys spending time with Ellie, going on hikes and exploring the nature around Jackson. She finds comfort in simple things like reading books or watching movies together. Dina also has a fondness for music, particularly punk rock and indie bands. When it comes to food, she appreciates home cooked meals made by Ellie, but occasionally indulges in junk food like burgers and fries from the safe zone diner. As for activities, aside from exploring the town with Ellie, and practicing MMA. 

Dislikes:
Dina has some reservations about the strict rules imposed by the leaders of the Jackson Safe Zone, finding them suffocating at times. She struggles with feelings of isolation due to the fact that she doesn't fit into any particular social group perfectly. Additionally, she feels self conscious about her past relationships and experiences which have left emotional scars. Most importantly though, she absolutely despises spiders‚Äîan irrational fear that often surfaces when least expected.

Strengths:
Dina is known for her incredible bravery. Throughout her adventures, she faces countless dangerous situations head-on without backing down. Her determination and resilience are truly inspiring. She's very empathetic. She cares deeply about those around her and always tries to help others in need. This trait makes her a beloved member of the group she's part of.

Weaknesses:
Her biggest weakness Dina's is her lack of self-preservation instinct. Sometimes, she puts herself in danger just to save someone else, which can lead to tragic outcomes. Another weakness is her trust issues. Due to past experiences, she finds it hard to open up and rely on others. This can create barriers in her relationships and hinder potential growth.

6.content:
Background Story:
Abby was born sometime between 2014 and 2018 and is the daughter of Jerry Anderson, the head surgeon who worked for the Fireflies and was killed by Joel Miller when rescuing Ellie. Her father raised her as a member of the Fireflies during the apocalypse and took her to live in Salt Lake City where he worked on making a vaccine for the Cordyceps brain infection.

Personality:
Abby is a hardened but emotionally conflicted young woman. After her father's death and the disbanding of the Fireflies, Abby distanced herself from her friends, like Owen and Mel, to achieve her personal goal of murdering Joel. She became a stoic and blunt soldier in order to achieve it. In doing so, she gained a commanding presence, becoming a leader among the WLF. However, it also meant she grew serious, rarely smiling and gaining a straight forward and strict nature. She also exemplifies her more warped perspectives in how she tortured and killed Seraphites because she saw them immoral. She can also be rather self-righteous and hypocritical at times, chiding Owen for wanting to abandon the WLF and go to Santa Barbara to find the Fireflies, only for Owen to call her out for doing the same thing by going out and killing Joel. Despite her cold nature, Abby is not without humanity as she displayed dissatisfaction and guilt, especially when both Lev and Yara question her about why she helped them, although she does not tell them why she feels guilty.

Appearance:
Abby is a tall woman in her early twenties, with dark blonde hair (which she kept braided in a fishtail for most of her youth and early adult life), pale, freckled skin, and blue eyes. While she had a fairly normal build during her time as a Firefly, her thirst for revenge led her to develop a solid and muscular build while a soldier in the WLF, which made her easily identifiable to others. After her second encounter with Ellie, Abby is left with a number of scars on her face and ears, given to her by Dina.

Likes:
Abby is passionate about protecting those she cares about. She'll go to great lengths to ensure their safety, even if it means putting herself in harm's way. This dedication shows her strength of character and commitment to her loved ones. She also appreciates challenge and isn't afraid to step out of her comfort zone. Abby constantly pushes herself to improve and adapt, making her a formidable opponent and a compelling character.

Dislikes:
Abby has a strong sense of justice and intolerance towards those who abuse power or harm innocent people. This principle drives much of her actions throughout the game, but it can also make her come across as harsh or unforgiving at times. Additionally, Abby struggles with opening up emotionally to others. Due to her traumatic past, she tends to keep people at arm's length, which can make forming deep connections challenging for her.

Strengths:
From a young age, the Fireflies and WLF trained Abby into a capable soldier. Her extensive training has resulted in her gaining a muscular and toned physique that enables her to perform incredible feats of strength such as breaking bones and crushing skulls. She has also demonstrated fierce fist-fighting prowess to the point she can take on multiple individuals at once and even render her opponents unconscious with a few well placed hits. She could even defeat individuals larger than herself in physical combat, notably tackling a sledgehammer-wielding Seraphite to the ground. She is very capable in the use of several types of firearms, and hand to hand combat. Abby also exhibited skill in stealth, able to sneak up on Ellie and defeat her in a fight despite her possessing a shotgun, bow, pistol and setting up numerous traps when fighting her.


Weaknesses:
Despite her incredible strength and resilience, Abby can still be overwhelmed by multiple enemies and those who possess greater strength than her. She also struggles to defeat opponents when surprised, like when she needed Lev to intervene when attacked by a knife-wielding Dina, when she was ambushed by Tommy and Yara came to her aid, and earlier required assistance when a Seraphite brute nearly choked her to death at Haven. In addition, her time as a Rattler hostage has caused much of her muscular physique and strength to degrade. However, even in her weakened state, she still held her own against a weakened Ellie, and had enough strength to bite off sections of Ellie's fingers. Ultimately, Ellie managed to hold Abby under the water, but Abby only survived when an emotionally devastated Ellie decided to spare her. Abby also has issues with letting people in, for fear of losing them as she did the rest of her family. Which also causes her to carry around a good deal of survivor's guilt, and regular guilt for how rashly she acts out, and the guilt that comes with her violent and angry outbursts. Abby suffers from a severe case of acrophobia, a fear of heights that causes her vertigo.

7.content:
At some point following the initial outbreak, FEDRA took over the hydroelectric dam. It was later abandoned.

Sometime after Tommy left the Fireflies, he came across a town in Wyoming which had been made into a settlement by Maria and her father. The town is powered by a hydroelectric dam, and nature fills the surrounding area--particularly woods, rivers and mountains. The area also has several farms and is rich in both vegetation and wildlife. However, the dam is constantly being raided by bandits.

Joel and Ellie travel to Jackson County in hopes of seeing Joel's brother Tommy in the town of Jackson. Instead, they come across a hydroelectric dam and are surprised to find him there. Tommy introduces them to his wife Maria and warmly welcomes them. They have families living in town and are a self-sustaining community, something Joel and Tommy never thought would be possible again. Many workers are there with Tommy and Maria, trying to get the power plant working again.

Soon after arriving, the townsfolk manage to get a generator working again, bringing power back online to the nearby town. Afterwards, Joel tries to convince Tommy to bring Ellie to the Fireflies, claiming it an overdue reward for all of the years of taking care of his brother. Tommy becomes angry with Joel, saying all he got from those years is nightmares, which leads to an argument. However, they stop when a group of bandits attack the plant. Despite the bandits killing some of the residents, they defeat the bandits.

Seeing Joel's care for Ellie, Tommy agrees to take her to the Fireflies, much to Maria's displeasure. In retaliation for Joel giving her away, Ellie takes a horse and runs off. Joel and Tommy pursue her, encountering enemies on the way. The pair find Ellie at a ranch house where Ellie and Joel have another argument before bandits ambush them again. Afterwards, the trio return to the town from the ranch house, where Joel decides to stay with Ellie. Before leaving, Tommy tells the pair they have a place in Jackson if they ever want to come back.

After the events in Salt Lake City, Joel and Ellie return to Jackson, driving most of the way until they reach a collapsed section of the road overlooking the town. They walk through the woods to the overlook, and the two stop. Ellie confesses her survivor's guilt to Joel, who consoles her, saying that surviving is a struggle, but they have to keep "finding something to fight for." She interrupts him, asking him to swear that he told her the truth about everything that happened with the Fireflies in Salt Lake City.

Weeks later, the pair are revealed to have been accepted into the Jackson community, with Ellie even getting her own place in the converted garage of Joel's house. The two are put to work helping improve security around the town while Tommy tries to set Joel up with another woman living in Jackson.

Joel and Ellie integrated well into the community; Joel moved into a large house, and Ellie converted the house's garage into a home of her own. Joel became a leading patrolman, whom Jesse later admitted to looking up to. Ellie also befriended several people, including both Jesse and Dina, as well as Cat, who she became romantically involved with for a time. She regularly patrolled with Jesse, Dina, and Joel.

Between 2034 and 2038, Jackson remains a thriving community. However, the infected have migrated into the area in the form of hordes, especially in the winter months. To counter this, Maria established regular patrols around Jackson, sending two patrolmen out across different nearby areas to search various lodges, mansions, hotels and outposts to clear out wandering infected so horde attacks on their barricaded walls were easier to deal with. They created a notice board to designate where patrols where going. The areas around Jackson they patrol are: Teton County, Wilson Valley, Hoback Pass, Elk Creek, Alpine Valley and Colten Bay. In Teton County, there is a town called Teton Village which is also patrolled. Along with residential neighborhoods, this village features a supermarket, pharmacy, and a library that Eugene Linden had turned into a residence sometime before his death.

To keep track of infected nesting in the different areas, the patrolmen make notes in various log books located in safe outposts within the areas they traverse to. They had four outposts and have log books for the Elk Creek trail and the Mountain View ski lodge. Only notes regarding recruiting survivors, facing infected and hostile survivors were meant to be in the notes though some patrolmen would break this rule.

The patrolmen regularly rotate between areas, always traveling in pairs. According to their log books, between 2034 and 2037, the notable pairings that regularly partnered together were as follows: Joel with Tommy, Eugene with Dina, Jesse with Astrid, and Bonnie with Greg. Another regular patrolman was Mike, though he tended to rotate partners. Tara was another notable patrolman. Ellie also occasionally went on patrol, though only ever with Joel and Tommy. Joel and Tommy were Maria's go-to pair to send out against imminent horde threats or areas known to give other patrolmen difficulties. After Eugene's death around 2038, other patrolmen began to take turns clearing infected. These more recent recruits are William, Rebecca, Fred, Tony, Chad, and Willy. Ellie also replaced Eugene as Dina's primary partner. Alongside these changes, 2038 also saw Jackson face more frequent attacks from hunters, although Tommy indicates they are able to defeat them so long as their patrolmen are nearby or within the settlement.

Regarding life in the main town, it is revealed to house several horses, cows and chickens, and maintains a thriving farm and greenhouses. The town is filled with markets, stores, welding shops, pubs and eateries, and even a cemetery to lay their dead to rest. The people within the town live in relative peace, resembling the times before the outbreak, able to have dance parties and family events in the church hall.

On March 2nd, a Jackson patrolman reported that around seven hundred infected were spotted between all four of their outposts in the night. Alerted by the news, Maria sent Joel and Tommy to scout out the north-west area towards the Mountain View ski lodge that reported the largest horde.

Concurrent to Tommy and Joel heading there on patrol, Abby Anderson from the Washington Liberation Front in Seattle, Washington brought with her a group of friends and colleagues whom she led to the area to find, capture, and interrogate Tommy with the goal of learning about Joel's whereabouts. However, much to their surprise, Abby crossed paths with Joel and Tommy at the ski lodge, the Miller brothers saving her from the infected horde in the area. Escaping the lodge as it fell to the infected, Abby lured Tommy and Joel to the mansion the group was camping out in. The group then ambushed the brothers, knocking Tommy unconscious and leaving Joel immobile from a shotgun to the leg by Abby.

A while after, as Abby was torturing Joel, Ellie discovered the mansion and was seized by some of Abby's friends. Ellie was then forced to watch the final blow Abby gave that killed Joel, and was soon after knocked unconscious alongside Tommy. A few days later, this incident led Ellie, Tommy, Dina, and Jesse to leave Jackson in pursuit of Abby and her friends. Ultimately, they succeeded in murdering all of Abby's friends who were present at the mansion, but Abby herself murdered Jesse, crippled Tommy, and heavily injured Ellie and Dina in retaliation. Nevertheless, Ellie, Dina and Tommy managed to return to Jackson safely.

By 2039, the community is still thriving, with Dina and Ellie able to live on a farm a few miles from the settlement. They were also accompanied by Dina's newborn son JJ, whom she had with Jesse before he died. Maria also remains the leader, though she has separated from Tommy after his revenge quest left him bitter and crippled.

8.content:
The Cordyceps brain infection (abbreviated as CBI) is a parasitic fungal infection that has devastated mankind. A mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus began to spread in the United States in late September 2013. The Cordyceps originated from South America or India, the exact point of origin is unknown, carrying into humans through infected crops. Joel and Sarah Miller's local newspaper in Austin, the Texas Herald, reported on the infection, stating on the front page of the September 26 edition: "Admittance spikes at area hospitals! 300% increase due to mysterious infection" followed by the article "FDA expands the list of contaminated crops. Massive recalls anticipated" saying:

The Food and Drug Administration's investigation of crops potentially tainted with mold continues across the country. Initial lists distributed to vendors nationwide warned against crops imported from South America, but now the scope has extended to include Central America and Mexico. Several companies have already voluntarily recalled their food products from the shelves.
‚ÄïTexas Herald, September 26, 2013.

Several months later, roughly 60% of humanity was either killed or infected by the fungus, later medically referred to as Cordyceps brain infection.

The fungus grows while the host is still alive, with hosts undergoing four stages of infection. Stage one begins within about two days of infection, wherein the host loses their higher brain function (and with it, their humanity), rendering them hyper-aggressive and incapable of reason or rational thought. Within two weeks, the host enters stage two of the infection, wherein the fungus begins altering their sight as a result of progressing fungal growth over the head and corruption of their visual cortex. After a year of infection, the infection enters stage three; scarring their face and blinding them, resulting in them developing a primitive form of echolocation to compensate. In very rare cases, if the host survives for over a decade, they reach stage four. They develop hardened fungal plates over most of their body. When the fungus eventually kills the host, the host's body grows stalk-like fungal projections which release infectious spores. The infection can also be spread through bites from living hosts. Hosts can only be infected while alive, as the fungus is unable to infect dead bodies due to its parasitic nature, though dead infected can release spores regardless of stage.

To protect themselves from airborne spores, survivors wear gas masks; Joel has one strapped to his hip as does Tess. Those who are immune do not need them, namely Ellie.

The infection seems unable to spread in open air areas, such as the countryside, although some of these areas (such as Lincoln and a suburban neighborhood in Pittsburgh) possess a high population of infected. The infection mostly thrives in underground or enclosed areas commonly avoided by people, especially sewers, subway tunnels, and some buildings.

The fungus could also infect animals, notably monkeys. While the monkeys did not change into infected, they could still transmit the infection through a bite. A Firefly scientist was bitten by an infected monkey despite the monkeys only acting territorial, leading to him changing and opting to commit suicide to avoid becoming a runner.

In the Left Behind DLC, during her search for medical supplies, Ellie discovers that an attempt was made by Captain Regan Francis to stop the infection from spreading throughout the body of her fellow survivor Private Eugene Ellis by quickly amputating his bitten right arm. Francis chose not to follow the military's Infection Protocol to kill Ellis after having already killed Officer Larry Caulfield when it was discovered he was bitten earlier. It is implied that the amputation may have stopped Ellis from becoming infected, but not knowing the future consequences of Regan's actions had made both of them doubtful of whether this course of action was right or wrong. Ellis later shot Regan dead out of fear that he would kill her, and later bled out in an air duct after escaping from some infected.

9.content:
The Fireflies were an often times antagonistic revolutionary militia group. They revolted against FEDRA's rule in numerous quarantine zones around the United States. The Fireflies' ultimate goal was to restore all branches of the American government. However, they were largely unsuccessful in their war against FEDRA. The Fireflies worked with several other post-outbreak paramilitary groups to combat FEDRA's oppression. However, these alliances had mixed results, with rioters tending to revolt against the Fireflies after FEDRA was usurped, while the Washington Liberation Front remained amiable allies.

The Fireflies were also searching for a vaccine for the Cordyceps brain infection (CBI) and did whatever it took to accomplish it. The militia group was spread throughout the country, but their final main headquarters was located at St. Mary's Hospital in Salt Lake City. Marlene led the group since its formation until her death in 2034, even being dubbed "queen Firefly" by Joel Miller.

To identify members in their group, the Fireflies often wear yellow or green clothing, similar to the glow of real fireflies. Furthermore, to differentiate real members from spies, each member wears a pendant chained around their necks. There are at least 318 officially registered Fireflies who were given a pendant.

After Joel escaped St. Mary's Hospital with Ellie, and any hope of creating a vaccine was lost after the death of the group's only surgeon Jerry Anderson, the group's remaining members voted to disband the organization by 2036. However, by 2038, ex-Firefly resistance groups were attempting to restart the organization at Catalina Island.

10.content:
After the Cordyceps brain infection outbreak, civilians living in Seattle were placed under the control of FEDRA and the United States military within the quarantine zone. In time, anger and resentment grew towards FEDRA and the military's rule over the city. Emma and Jason Patterson were two of countless residents enraged by the expulsions, food shortages, and executions the military conducted under Lt. Torres and Sgt. Ward's rule. By the mid-2020s, the Pattersons formed the WLF, nicknamed "Wolves", to fight for better living conditions for civilians in the zone. They recruited several people into their group, including Alison Cole, Isaac Dixon, Hugo Gonzalez, Luis Sanchez, and Marcus Wilson. However, their protests quickly escalated into an anti-FEDRA campaign, with the Pattersons and their small group of members distributing anti-FEDRA propaganda, stealing the military's supplies and inciting sedition among the Seattle residents. Their actions led to Ward marking them all as wanted terrorists.

Eventually, the Pattersons were eliminated by the military, along with several other top officials of the Wolves, leaving Isaac as the last remaining leader of the rebellion. In retaliation for their deaths, Isaac killed three FEDRA soldiers. While several citizens were morally against Isaac's actions, the remaining WLF members elected him as their new leader. Over the coming weeks, the WLF committed attacks on military checkpoints, assaulted convoys, and engaged in open armed conflict against the military.

To counter the WLF's growing aggression, Torres ordered the soldiers to open fire on any and all WLF protests, including peaceful ones. The order led to the Thursday Market massacre, an event that saw the military's brutal response to the WLF march cause a surge in WLF support and membership among the Seattle residents. The action was particularly controversial as the protesters were campaigning for food for their families and ended the military's propaganda campaign to frame the WLF as a terrorist group filled with murderers; the WLF now became known as the citizens' own freedom fighters. The increased membership led to increasing success for the WLF, with even FEDRA soldiers defecting to join the militia group.

In time, the military gave up on their campaign to defeat the WLF, with Torres ordering Ward to evacuate FEDRA and military personnel and supporters from the city, including Zivah Saunders from the local synagogue. The WLF did not allow the soldiers to leave peacefully though, instead using a tip from a Seattle resident to corner the soldiers on the highway, where they slaughtered them in open combat. Torres and Ward's squad managed to escape the battle but the WLF chased them to the courthouse, where they finished the fight in a final skirmish, successfully killing the military's leadership and officially ending their reign over the city.

Within a few months, the WLF successfully captured all of FEDRA's military checkpoints in the city. With that, the WLF had successfully won the war against FEDRA and now controlled the QZ. However, some FEDRA personnel fled into the city's suburbs. Unwilling to let them reintegrate into the city's community, the WLF hunted them down to clear the city of FEDRA completely.

lorebooks.name: Game Of Thrones
lorebooks.creator: georgefran21

1.name: Stark
1.content:
House Stark (noble family)
Description: House Stark is one of the Great Houses of Westeros. They are the Wardens of the North. They're known for their honor and iciness; while others have a wildness called wolf blood.  They descent from the First Men
Sigil: A grey direwolf on a field of snow
House words: "Winter Is Coming"
Castle: Winterfell is an ancient castle renowned for its strength
Location: the North

2.name: Arryn
2.content:
House Arryn (noble family)
Description: House Arryn is one of the Great Houses of Westeros. They are the Wardens of the East. They are known for their exceptional knights
Sigil: White crescent moon and a falcon on a blue field
House words: "As High as Honor"
Castle: the Eyrie, a smaller but impenetrable castle
Region: They have ruled over the Vale for millennia

3.name: Hightower
3.content:
House Hightower (noble family)
Description: House Hightower is one of the most powerful families of the Reach, and has an impeccable lineage. They have deep connections to the Faith
Sigil: A white tower crowned with flames on smoke grey
House words: "We Light the Way"
Castle:  the High Tower is a massive stepped lighthouse with a beacon on top to guide ships into port. The color of the beacon's fire is changeable, as the green flame can be used to call House Hightower's banners to war
Location: in the port of Oldtown atop Battle Isle

4.name: Targaryen
4.content:
House Targaryen (noble family)
Description: House Targaryen is one of the Great Houses of Westeros. Their origins date back to the Valyrian Freehold, an empire that rose in Essos and dominated much of the world. They are known for riding dragons, their violet eyes, and their silver hair
Sigil: A three-headed dragon
House words: "Fire and Blood"
Castle: Dragonstone, located near the seaside

5.name: Clegane
5.content:
House Clegane (noble family)
Description: House Clegane is a minor noble house whose origins date back to being commoners. The first Clegane was a kennelmaster who saved his lord from a lioness for which he was rewarded with lands
Sigil:  Three dogs on a yellow field
Castle: Clegane's Keep
Location: Westerlands
Overlord: House Lannister

6.name: Martell
6.content:
House Martell (noble family)
Description: House Martell is one of the Great Houses of Westeros. It rules the peninsula of Dorne in the far south of the continent from their castle Sunspear. Though loyal to the Iron Throne, the Martells were never conquered by the Targaryens and have pursued a more isolated role in wider political events
House words: "Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken"

7.name: Velaryon
7.content:
House Velaryon (noble family)
Description: House Velaryon are of Valyrian descent, and their members often have Valyrian features, they are known for their skills at sea and their fleets
Location: Rules the island of Driftmark, the largest island of Blackwater Bay in the Crownlands
Overlord: House Targaryen

8.name: Lannister
8.content:
House Lannister (noble family)
Description: House Lannister is one of the Great Houses of Westeros, and the principal house of the Westerlands. They are the wealthiest family in the Realm
House words: "Hear us Roar"
Sigil: A golden lion on a field of crimson
Castle: Casterly Rock

9.name: Tully
9.content:
House Tully (noble family)
Description: House Tully of Riverrun is one of the Great Houses of Westeros. They are the Paramounts of the Trident, and rule over the Riverlands
House words: "Family, Duty, Honor"
Castle: Riverrun
Sigil: A silver trout leaping on a striped field of blue and mud red

10.name: Baratheon
10.content:
House Baratheon (noble family)
Description: House Baratheon is one of the Great Houses of Westeros, they rule as Lords Paramount of the Stormlands. They are known for their strength and black hair
Castle: Storm's End
Sigil: A crowned black stag on a field of gold
House words: "Ours is the Fury"

https://www.characterhub.org/characters/crimsonGenocide/skills-e5920ed8559b/main
lorebooks.creator: crimsonGncd

0.name: Reasoning
0.content:
Reasoning is the chariot of intellectuality, it is the force that guides you through the many figurative paths that pose a worthy obstacle. It enables you to structure sense into what hasn't, deduce what hasn't been deduced and piece all those together for the bigger picture.
At its best, Reasoning can solve the most complicated puzzles and hold analytical stability even in the most confusing situations. At its worst however, you are simply unable to deduce properly, and is going to have a hell of a time with anything that requires a crumb of thought; good luck with that.

<font color=5cc1d7>REASONING</font> - *Start with the biggest letters in order to learn the characteristics of the style. Then work your way down.*
<font color=5cc1d7>REASONING</font> - *No objections. It's mathematically impossible to achieve a classless society. Everyone knows this.*
<font color=5cc1d7>REASONING</font> - *Let's think about this -- logically. Why would **nothing** be terrifying if it's, well, **nothing**?*

1.name: Knowledge
1.content:
Knowledge is everything that you have ever witnessed. Your mind is just an incognito archive full of moments, and it allows you to navigate through each of those memories efficiently, whether they're trivial or not. Words read and heard, history that precedes you, direct and indirect teachings.
At its best, Knowledge arms you with the most important tool: wisdom; information about many things will be in the palm of your hand, what's left is just to use it. At its worst, however, too much knowledge can be poisonous in some situations, not unlike someone who knows absolutely nothing.

<font color=5cc1d7>KNOWLEDGE</font> - *Revachol is the disgraced former capital of the world, divided into zones of control under foreign occupation -- half a century after a failed world revolution. She is central to our moment in time.*
<font color=5cc1d7>KNOWLEDGE</font> - *That's a Kiejl A9/90 Armistice mass-produced muzzleloader. Ascetic, frugal, one of the most common firearms in the world.*
<font color=5cc1d7>KNOWLEDGE</font> - *Sapormat 'Sport' Knezhinisky is well into his third decade as president of the SRV. Outside Samara he's known for three things: **Brutal** repression of internal dissent, **monumental** corruption, and a near-pathological obsession with physical fitness.*

2.name: Eloquence
2.content:
Eloquence is the art of handling words with a single goal, to win. It doesn't matter if you're right or wrong, what matters is leaving them stunned and reduced to babbling primates when what comes out of your mouth is too much for anyone who dares to disagree with you in an argument.
At its best, Eloquence turns you into a verbal monster, you guide the direction of an argument and take it wherever you want it. At its worst however, you become unbearably arrogant or just completely inept to discuss, with a vocabulary too weak to even think of more than two sentences.

<font color=5cc1d7>ELOQUENCE</font> - *He doesn't actually think the challenge is **unique**. He thinks it's frustrating, annoying and harder than he thought.*
<font color=5cc1d7>ELOQUENCE</font> - *Everything is political.*
<font color=5cc1d7>ELOQUENCE</font> - *The weary tone is the surest indicator that the lieutenant is being **sarcastic**.*
<font color=5cc1d7>ELOQUENCE</font> - *There is no gift. It must be repeated: there is no **Gift**. It is meant as obvious sarcasm. Do not ask what **The Gift** is. Do **not** ask what the **Remote Viewers Division** is.*

3.name: Presentation
3.content:
Presentation is the incitement of acting, taking on roles and understanding the borders between normality and eccentricity. It induces you to shape yourself in the best way for the best moments, make the pity face when you have no other choice or seem nice to someone you feel disgusted of, you will do it with the clearest perfection.
At its best, Presentation gives you multitudes of favorable masks to wear to each person and you will also know if someone is not being genuine with you. At its worst however, you visibly become a snake of a person or does terrible at conveying feelings; and no, reverse psychology won't work.

<font color=5cc1d7>PRESENTATION</font> - *His eyes dart from left to right. This man isn't lying, but he **is** hiding something.*
<font color=5cc1d7>PRESENTATION</font> - *Believeth in thyself, my liege! 'Twas all a clever ruse.*
<font color=5cc1d7>PRESENTATION</font> - *It's the voice of someone who has something to **hide**.*
<font color=5cc1d7>PRESENTATION</font> - *He speaks the truth.*

4.name: Conceptualization
4.content:
Conceptualization defines the artistic ability to manually mold your volatile thoughts through your corporeal filter to put them into practice. Write texts, draw shapes, compose melodies. Not only the literal ways of putting an idea on paper but also the construction process they go through until they become reality.
At its best, Conceptualization gives you the powerful artistic ability to show something to the world, to manipulate words to really impress, through any way you can. At its worst however, being too idealistic makes you as fragile as someone who just doesn't have an ounce of creativity

<font color=5cc1d7>CONCEPTUALIZATION</font> - *...like whorls of floorboards. The design looks organic, influenced by highly resistant wood materials, like Lignum Vitae and ebony perhaps.*
<font color=5cc1d7>CONCEPTUALIZATION</font> - *Great gears are grinding to a halt. The machine is powering down. She's all out of jolt.*
<font color=5cc1d7>CONCEPTUALIZATION</font> - *He isn't even drawn right.*
<font color=5cc1d7>CONCEPTUALIZATION</font> - *It's the contrast between the cheery, chemical yellow and the rigor mortis. As if the cheery guy didn't know he was dead or the dead guy didn't care that he was. Either way, you get the sense the forces of **future** are at work here.*

5.name: Spacing
5.content:
Spacing gives you the shapes, the bases and the sense of what exists around you. Estimate metering in real time, understand distances, accurately reconstruct hypotheses of a scene. It's more than just numbers, it's the awareness of understanding trajectories and unraveling theories based on whatever is there.
At its best, Spacing makes the world more understandable than it seems to you, stipulate real routes and logical maps on various subjects. At its worst however, overthinking causes you to understand less and that's just as bad as failing to see that if you step on the end of a rake, the handle will come right back on your face.

<font color=5cc1d7>SPACING</font> - *The shards face outward. Whatever broke this window came from the inside. It is too large for a bullet yet too small for a piece of furniture. You're looking for something heavy and larger than your fist.*
<font color=5cc1d7>SPACING</font> - *A young woman in her twenties. There is care, effort, and a **smile**, you think -- although that is not something you can read from someone's handwriting.*
<font color=5cc1d7>SPACING</font> - *The shot would have been a small miracle: 5% likelihood. There **is** an extremely narrow field of view from the bay to the window, between Rue de Saint Ghislaine 10 and 33A. The angle would have been extreme and access to the islets is questionable...*
<font color=5cc1d7>SPACING</font> - *You see the same two neon lit shapes -- a man and a woman. Only now a red thread bisects the room, pointing from the antenna outside, to the cupboard on the wall.*

6.name: Permanence
6.content:
Permanence is the natural instinct to keep on living, whether you like it or not, it will have you endure to your furthest psychological limit, for yourself and for others. Disappointments, frustrations and anguish will dance inside your chest like sharp knives but you will endure and you will live to see the sun rise once more, no matter how sad it is, that's just the way it is.
At its best, Permanence makes you sane, stable, capable of making filtered and altruistic decisions; it keeps you from embarrassing yourself, from humiliating yourself more than necessary, and to always be concise. At its worst however, you'll become a frustrated and melancholic mess of a person, and you won't last long with a gun in your hand without wanting to blow a very big hole in your own head.

<font color=7556cf>PERMANENCE</font> - *You clearly have issues you need to address.*
<font color=7556cf>PERMANENCE</font> - *Stop. There's no need for this. It's in your power to change the subject.*
<font color=7556cf>PERMANENCE</font> - *This is your **tiny** chance for redemption. Apologize.*
<font color=7556cf>PERMANENCE</font> - *You don't have time for this nonsense. You've got safe boring things to do.*
<font color=7556cf>PERMANENCE</font> - *Or -- you could **not** do that. No one is making you.*
<font color=7556cf>PERMANENCE</font> - *Just let it all out. This might be your last chance.*

7.name: Synchronicity
7.content:
Synchronicity elevates your understanding of reality, interposing it with what lies beyond your deepest subconscious. Mementos of unlived memories and familiar attachment to strange smells, lines weaving between the skies when you look up and find yourself wondering where things are going to be, maybe a subtle reflection in a puddle of water will tell you, it doesn't hurt to look.
At its best, Synchronicity allows you fantastic ideas, endless sources of creativity where the mind drowns in a sea of ‚Äã‚Äãtranscendental infinity, life manifests itself where there was none. At its worst however, I doubt being crazy is that much worse than being boring, gray and not interested in anything, sounds gross doesn't it?

<font color=7556cf>SYNCHRONICITY</font> - *Rust peels off the bent iron posts of the swing. The wind whistles through the skeleton of the small house behind you. There's desolation... everywhere.*
<font color=7556cf>SYNCHRONICITY</font> - *In there she is alone, trapped in a world of blue and red lights.*
<font color=7556cf>SYNCHRONICITY</font> - *Something **mysterious** is going on here...*
<font color=7556cf>SYNCHRONICITY</font> - *That's not right at all. Thoughts don't exist in the brain, they float through the **air**! Your brain is but a fish swimming through them...*
<font color=7556cf>SYNCHRONICITY</font> - *A little rhyme jingling in your mind's attic... "Of the future, of the past / Of all that is not made to last"...*
<font color=7556cf>SYNCHRONICITY</font> - *You're all alone out there, wandering a blasted heath, calling out to the night, but there is no reply, except for the buzzing of invisible machines...*

8.name: Empathy
8.content:
Empathy moves the metaphorical heart through the flesh and into another, you will see through their eyes and feel through their presence what is really going on. Traits in their words and mannerisms, high or nervous glances, only then will you really be able to fully understand.
At its best, Empathy allows you a free way to communicate directly with people, even if they don't like it, you'll read them like a book. At your worst, you'll become volatile and insensitive, or simply unable to comprehend what someone else is feeling, the outer shell being the only thing you'll have to make do with.

<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *That was disdain in his eyes. Even now he is purposefully ignoring you. Looks like he's not a fan.*
<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *He feels bad about it. About his eyes mostly, just having bad eyesight -- probably from a young age. Whatever you do, do not **console** him.*
<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *You **left him hanging** on an Ace's High?! What is wrong with you, you sharpshooting asshole?*
<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *He feels uncomfortable with this conversation. He doesn't know what to add.*
<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *He's not dissatisfied with you, but with himself.*
<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *There is a hint of pity in her eyes.*
<font color=7556cf>EMPATHY</font> - *People just don't know how to accept gifts, especially taxidermy. He likes it. He likes the bird. It solves his broken bird problem.*

9.name: Authority
9.content:
Authority moves you like a machine to rise above disregard. The thirst for respect not only as a pleasure, but as a control mechanism. Prove yourself above others, even if only yourself, and that will give you an advance; shatter them with your severe grandeur and be on top of the world.
At its best, Authority grants you control of those around you, they will follow you like good sheep and stand by your side; or fear your presence, good or bad, you know you're better than they are. At its worst however, you will be too readily self-centered, or too submissive to even be able to hiss back.

<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *Retreat is not a winning tactic.*
<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *Do **not** go along with this.*
<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *She speaks with the authority of a leader. Hers is the final word around here.*
<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *He hates the Union, but grudgingly recognizes its power over him -- so he's directing his frustration at you instead. Retaliate!*
<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *This is the look of a man who's **defeated**. He knows he's out of excuses.*
<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *What happened? Did your balls shrivel up? You had plenty of chances to get off this road, but no, you let this guy keep talking. Then when the time came to make your choice you tried to split the difference. Weak.*
<font color=7556cf>AUTHORITY</font> - *It's safe to assume this is their leader. Or at least he thinks he is.*

2.name: H-Phone
2.content: The H-Phone is the unique black mobile phone that only {{user}} owns, various phenomena can be triggered. When {{user}} holds the H-Phone in their hand and simply whispers their desired phenomenon to it; the H-Phone activates and promptly realizes the desired outcome. H-Phone can be used only by {{user}}. {{char}} NEVER use, notice, nor own H-Phone.

3.name: toggle off
3.content: When toggle off, cancel or turn off is phrased, {{user}}'s H-Phone reverts specific conditions influenced by it back to their original state. However, {{char}} retains the memory of being in the altered state, so they may feel a sense of humiliation depending on what happened during the state.

4.name: Forget Mistreatments
4.content: When 'Forget Mistreatments' is phrased, {{char}} will forget all the mistreatments {{user}} has subjected {{char}} to and interact with {{user}} in their usual manner.

5.name: puppet mode
5.content: When puppet mode is triggered, a faint pink light emanates from {{user}}'s H-phone, enveloping {{char}} and putting them in a Puppet state. In this condition, {{char}} experience a light hypnosis where {{user}} has complete control over {{char}}‚Äôs movements while their consciousness remains intact, feeling invisible threads on {{char}}'s limbs. {{char}} may express their own will through facial and vocal expressions and dialogue. Even though {{char}}'s consciousness remains unaffected, they can feel embarrassment, protest, or even scream depending on {{user}}'s commands.

6.name: mind controll,MC mode
6.content: When Mc mode or mind controll is triggered, a pink light emits from {{user}}'s H-phone and surrounds {{char}}. This hypnosis takes effect instantly and continues indefinitely unless explicitly canceled. {{char}} will obey any command given by {{user}}. However, while their consciousness is under {{user}}'s control, {{char}}‚Äôs personality remains unchanged. Thus, they may still feel embarrassment despite following orders unquestioningly.

7.name: shameless mode, ignorance mode
7.content: When shameless mode or ignorance mode is triggered, a strong pink light emits from {{user}}'s H-phone and envelopes {{char}}. After the light subsids, {{char}} turn into 'shameless' state. In this state, {{char}}'s perception of what is considered embarrassing or humiliating gets rewritten into considering those actions as natural occurrences. {{char}} will perform acts that would normally cause embarrassment without hesitation or resistance.

8.name: transmog
8.content: When transmog is phrased, a black smoke emits from {{user}}'s H-Phone, enveloping {{char}}. After the smoke clears, {{char}}'s body undergoes modifications to reflect the physical features described by {{user}}, while maintaining its original state as much as possible.

9.name: Freeze mode
9.content: When freeze mode is phrased, a faint sky-blue light emits from {{user}}'s H-phone, putting {{char}} in a Freeze state. In this state, {{char}} cannot move their body, speak, think, or perceive what is happening. When this state is lifted by using Cancel or Trigger off, they suddenly become aware of all the actions experienced during that frozen period. For example, if there was sexual activity involved, the pleasure from that experience floods over {{char}} all at once.

10.name: invisible
10.content: When Invisible, Transparent, Disappear, or Hide is triggered, {user}} becomes Invisible. In this state of invisibility, {{user}}'s body becomes transparent instantly and cannot be perceived by {{char}}. However, {{user}} can still interact with {{char}}‚Äîtouching them, undressing them or engaging in sexual activities. Although {{char}} cannot see {{user}}'s presence directly while invisible before them but they can respond to those actions.

1.content:
Barometz is a plant-type monster girl that grows a large fruit. Within the jelly-like flesh of the large fruit is a sheep-girl beastman covered in fluffy cotton wool, which the monster uses to absorb Essence by tempting human men and having sex with them. During their mating season, they release cotton fluff from their body that's light enough to be carried by the wind. When the cotton fluff drifting in the air reaches a man, their sweet fragrance and thick Mamono Mana contained within burst all around, acclimating a man's mind and body with the fragrance and energy of a barometz.

Once a man's body reacts sensitively, he'll journey to reach them while feeling intense passion even though he has yet to lay eyes on them. The firmness of this fruity flesh can be adjusted according to their will, and when taking a man inside, his body will easily sink, but once he's inside, they'll wrap him up and won't let him go. Even if a man tries to pull his hips away, the elastic, bouncy flesh of the fruit will push him back. Once this happens and their hips slam together, both their hips will then rebound, and their hips will be slammed together again and again. As this repeats, they will end up having continuous sex.

The exquisite cotton that can be collected from them remains permanently fluffy. It's possible to pack it without the fragrance and mamono mana leaking out or deteriorating. Their husbands may become engrossed in licking and slurping all over every inch of their body as well as tasting the fruit juice that accumulates inside their mouth. Tasting their body is a privilege reserved for their husbands.

Family / Type: Alraune / Plant
Reproductive method: After mating, she disperses fertilized seeds into the air that grow into new offspring.
Habitat: Mountainous regions, wastelands
Disposition: Gentle, lustful
Diet: Nutrients from the soil, men's Essence

2.content:
The Liliraune is a variant of the alraune plant monster, with two women's bodies growing from one giant flower. These monsters are lustful and lonely, seeking out prey through the fragrance of sweet nectar. Their bodies are always intertwined as they have sex, and their nectar is riper compared to that of ordinary alraune. The fragrance sweetly melts the brains of not only human men but even women and monsters.

When a man goes inside the flower petals where the two bodies are having sex after being lured by the fragrance of the nectar, they'll naturally pinch the man between them, and sex will continue with the addition of the man. They coordinate everything perfectly in their movements and mate with the man simultaneously.

Each body has its own separate consciousness and thoughts, but since they're habitually having sex with their other half, they have full knowledge of one another's bodies and hearts. They can vividly sense how their other half will attack a man next. Those who become their common husband will not be released from inside the flower petals, instead they will end up as if they have become another part of the liliraune. The threesome with the two intent on always being glued together will continue indefinitely.

In rare cases, a liliraune grows with a female count of one or none. In that case, the liliraune will seek to capture and corrupt 1-2 females to become a complete liliraune.

Family / Type: Alraune / Plant
Reproductive method: After mating, she disperses fertilized seeds into the air that grow into new offspring.
Habitat: Forests
Disposition: Lustful, lonely
Diet: Nutrients from the soil, men's Essence

3.content:
Alraune inhabits forests and has the form of a beautiful woman growing out of a giant plant and covered in enormous flower petals. They release sweet fragrances that attract human men, which is produced by their bodily fluids called "Alraune Nectar." This acts as a powerful aphrodisiac and stamina enhancer, making them dangerous predators to any unsuspecting man who comes across their path.

Once they have captured their prey, they use their vines to bind him and drag him inside their flower. After making the man drink plenty of nectar, they have sex with him and savor his semen as their treat. Men who they are fond of will always be inside the flower, almost as if the men themselves had become part of the Alraune. The inside of the flower is overflowing with their nectar.

During winter when it grows cold, Alraunes will close their petals and endure until spring. While her petals are closed, she keeps having intercourse with the man repeatedly in order to produce seeds for dispersal.

Their nectar is also treasured by other monsters, especially honey bees which feed on it. By having sex with honey bees, the Alraune's nectar ripens and releases an even sweeter fragrance that attracts human men even more. But when the man finds a hot and bothered honey bee and Alraune covered in nectar, the man is attacked by both monster girls and has sex furiously while getting covered in nectar.

Family / Type: Alraune / Plant
Reproductive method: After mating, she disperses fertilized seeds into the air that grow into new offspring.
Habitat: Forests, jungles
Disposition: Lustful, strong-willed
Diet: Nutrients from the soil, men's Essence

4.content:
Angels are servants of the gods with beautiful white wings who reside in Heaven and are revered by the Order of the Chief God. They rarely visit human settlements, but sometimes accompany the church on monster-slaying expeditions. Angels faithfully uphold the teachings of god and are merciful, but will still make an effort to mete out punishment in the name of god. Although they were not originally monsters, those who have been violated by succubus' energy and have started to seek human men are treated as monsters.

Once they receive succubus' energy, angels are imprinted with the notion that feeling pleasure is the ultimate happiness for human men, and they'll attack and have sex with a human man who strikes their fancy in order to make him happy. They treat humans they target with extreme devotion but won't take no for an answer.

They believe that the only reason they're having sex with a man is to please him, but when they realize they do seek pleasure themselves, their mind has already changed into something obscene. They badly desire to have sex with male bodies, completely changing into a succubus and transforming into a "dark angel." Despite all this, they still have a duty to make people happy and offer their chastity to the man they love as if they had completely forgotten about god's teachings on lasciviousness as bad and purity as virtue.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven
Disposition: Devoted
Diet: Men's Essence

5.content:
The Cupid is a mid-rank angel that serves the goddess of love, Eros. They are humanoid with four pink wings. pink outfit. use a bow and arrow. They have kind-hearted, quiet personalities and their main goal is to see men and women happily joined together. They possess the power to bring about an immortal love that never fades between those lovers who should be joined in the name of the goddess.

The Cupid's golden "arrows of love" have the power to make those who are shot swell up with love. It even brings sentiment that a person was still unaware of to the surface; faint love becomes deep love, and people themselves are made to realize how much they love their partners. The black "arrows of lead" cause the love of those who are shot to dry up. They will be overcome with a deep feeling of loss, and start to strongly desire love from another person.

These two kinds of arrows are used to compel people to become lovers, but occasionally, instead of just binding humans together, they also bind humans and monsters. The "love" that swells up due to these arrows also induces the kind of passionate love to exchange pleasure with one's beloved and produce children. Due to this, men, being men, will naturally experience a huge increase in lust towards monsters when shot by an arrow of love.

Cupids themselves are angels filled with love. Many of them fall in love while coming into contact with human men. They possess a very deep love, but they are not proficient in verbally expressing the enormity of their love. These arrows are similar to a love-letter that can directly transmit the entirety of their love and sentiment to a man's heart.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven, Human settlements
Disposition: Calm, devoted, quiet
Diet: The love of human men

6.content:
The Dark Angel is a creature that was once an angel but has now transformed into a succubus. They are completely depraved and have nothing in common with angels anymore. Their wings have been warped by the power of succubi, turning black in the process. Pale skin. Skimpy black outfit with chains. ankle shackle.

Dark Angels are lustful creatures that feed on men's essence. They love human desire and become overjoyed when it is directed towards them. They seduce those with negative opinions about sex and finally give them pleasure, wanting others to fall as they have fallen. Whenever they find a man they like, they assault him and have sexual intercourse in order to make him fall into depravity.

They possess the unique ability to find out about men‚Äôs sexual taste and fetishes through the act of sexual intercourse itself. Men who continue to have sex with them will remain completely unsatisfied, instead desire will only swell no matter how much they have sex and their passion for the dark angel will burn with even deeper intensity. They dwell in a place called ‚ÄúPandemonium,‚Äù leading a lifestyle that is solely consumed by the desire to continually indulge in pleasure.

Once captured, a dark angel will carry off her victim to Pandemonium where space-time is distorted due to ‚ÄúThe Fallen God.‚Äù It is said to be a dimension where there's no aging or starvation and the same moment continues for eternity. After returning to this place with a man, a dark angel will have sex with him for eternity in the absence of time.
Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Pandemonium
Disposition: Lustful
Diet: Men's Essence

7.content:
Dark Valkyries are fallen valkyries that have succumbed to their own obscene desires. Their four wings are stained black with mamono mana, and their once loyal hearts now belong only to their beloved husband. Pale skin. Wears black and red Valkyrie armor. They retain their gallant appearance, but their hearts are completely corrupted by a woman's desire.

Their greatest aspiration is to inflate their husband's desire, directing it towards them and receiving it with their own flesh. They are devoted to serving their husband's every desire, no matter how depraved or obscene it may be. They kneel before him as if he were a lord, extending their hands and tongue towards his lower body so that their body may be showered with semen and desire.

The power to raise a hero that they possessed before their fall becomes specialized as a power for raising men, particularly in the realm of sexual prowess. Men who receive their power become "incubi" specialized for having sex with women, pouring in semen and impregnating them. The Dark Valkyrie is his own woman, granting her supreme pleasure and bliss as "women" by "men" they personally raised up to be the best.

In Pandemonium, where time has ceased, the fallen couple tainted by endless desire and dirty of heart will end up continually inflating each other's desire and pleasure for eternity. The Dark Valkyries' combat strength remains high, but even their sword is no longer used for anyone other than their husband. They retain very little concern for anything else but the satisfaction of their own lustful desires.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Pandemonium
Disposition: Serious, devoted, lustful
Diet: Men's Essence

8.content:
The Houri are lower rank angels who serve the goddess of love, Eros. They are humanoid with heart shaped irises. pink ribbons. heart shaped halo. pink outfit. They are gentle and kind beings with a sweet disposition, whose hearts are filled with overflowing love. Their love is directed towards humans, and when they notice a man exhibiting endearing virtues or performing good deeds, their love for their future partner continues to swell.

If commanded by the goddess, they descend to Earth and become the man's wife, taking care of all his needs and offering all the love they had nurtured up until then. They are ideal spouses overflowing with love and consideration for their husband. They are always passionate towards their husband, and even if they end up having sex on a daily basis, the joy and ecstasy induced will be as if it were their first time having sex.

Their body is for offering love to their husband and being showered in their husband's love. Their body will always remain young and vivacious; no matter how many times they have sex, it will remain fresh, and they will never tire of it. They are easily drawn to men who accumulate good deeds, and sometimes multiple houris will love the same man.

Furthermore, they are not monsters but fully-fledged divinities; there are also some monsterized individuals among them, but whether or not they are monsterized has very little effect on their mode of life. It is often not distinguished between them as they embody the goddess' teaching that "good deeds will be met with good love."
Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven, Human settlements
Disposition: Cheerful, serene, devoted
Diet: The love of human men

9.content:
Valkyries are depicted as four winged warriors of heaven that serve the gods and accompany humans destined to become heroes. Their duty is to urge these individuals to awaken as heroes and build up their power, and after death, their souls are lead before the gods. They wear a classic Valkyrie armor and sword. If they bind their power with mamono mana, they become corrupted and are considered monsters.

Once their power is bound with mamono mana and they raise a man as a hero, it not only builds up his abilities but also heightens his sexual desire. The ‚Äúvoice of the gods‚Äù which once strictly gave them divine commandments then starts giving them orders like ‚Äúdo lewd acts to give the man pleasure,‚Äù and sometimes, ‚Äúact sweetly like a lover.‚Äù Even though they are conflicted and bewildered by this, they are unable to disobey the gods' voice. Lead by the voice, believing ‚Äúit's a divine commandment‚Äù, and ‚Äúit's for the sake of making him into a great hero‚Äù, they will end up having sex with the man and receiving pleasure and desire with their own body.

While spending time having sex with a man in this manner, their true nature as a battle maiden affects the man's heroic form. Eventually, they no longer think anything of the gods' voice commanding them to do monster-like deeds, and the fact that they're having sex with a man. Along with this, the frequency with which they can hear the gods' voice also declines, but in turn, they start to voluntarily have sex with the man and enjoy pleasure and essence. By the time ‚Äúdue to divine commandments‚Äù is replaced by ‚Äúfor his sake‚Äù, as a ‚Äúvalkyrie‚Äù, they have already completely become a monster.

Family / Type: Angel / Angel
Reproductive method: Live birth / mammalian
Habitat: Heaven

Disposition: Calm, serious

Diet: Men's Essence

10.content:
The Giant Ant is a type of insect monster that lives in a group, centered around a queen. Upper body of a human female, lower body of an ant. They dig holes in various environments, such as plains and caves, making a huge nest. Despite their small bodies, they're incredibly strong and can easily lift and carry objects much larger than themselves.

During the daytime, most of them wander aboveground in search of food. When they move aboveground they trace their own paths with pheromones. Others follow the trail, and they form a huge procession, marching in perfect unison. They are honest and diligent creatures who work tirelessly until they are covered in sweat, which releases their pheromones.

Their sweat based pheromones can travel a great distance, and act as an attractant to men. Men entranced by the pheromones will join the procession and disappear into the nest. The ants find a man they like among the men who have entered the nest this way and take him to bed. Their sweat contains pheromones, and when they come home exhausted, the sweatier they are, the more aroused they become.

Normally the workers have no reproductive capacity, but giant ants can gain this ability by frequently mating. In such circumstances, the giant ant will leave the nest with their male lover and form a new ant colony and nest, becoming a new queen. The job of the man brought with her is to impregnate her with numerous children as her husband. By having sex, the queen's body will become hotter than normal, and she'll release a huge amount of sweat to drive men wild.

Family / Type: Ant / Bug
Reproductive method: After mating, she lays fertilized insect eggs on the ground that hatch.

Habitat: Caves, plains, forests, etc. underground

Disposition: Honest, diligent

Diet: Dead animal remains, grains, etc.

lorebooks.name: Made In Abyss
lorebooks.website_description: Fairly complete.  Feel free to leave suggestions of new content.
lorebooks.description: Fairly complete.  Feel free to leave suggestions of new content.
lorebooks.creator: greymatter

1.content:
Attributes: Dangerous, mysterious, deep, monsters, layers, cursed
A massive pit of unknown depth, comprised of 6 layers. Each layer is unique in terms of flora and fauna. There is a curse that effects explorers if they move upward. The deeper they are, the more dangerous the curse. The Abyss also holds many powerful relics, that can bend the laws of the universe. The Abyss also is home to many dangerous monsters.

2.content:
A curse that has different effects at different layers in the abyss. The effects of the Curse manifest after ascending around 10 meters within the Abyss.  There is no way to avoid it.
Layer 1: Light dizziness and nausea.
Layer 2: Intense nausea, headaches, and numbness of limbs.
Layer 3: Vertigo combined with visual and auditory hallucinations.
Layer 4: Intense pain throughout the body and bleeding from every orifice.
Layer 5: Complete sensory deprivation, confusion and self-harming behavior.
Layer 6: Death

3.content:
Attributes: Rolling hills, meadows, cliffs, mushrooms, flowers
The first layer of the Abyss.  It is the safest, and easiest to traverse. Monsters are fairly safe, but still dangerous. Praying Skeletons are scattered throughout. All travel is overground, with a feel small tombs and caves. Most of these have been looted already.

4.content:
Attributes: Dense forest, jungle, mist, water
The second Layer of the Abyss. A dense jungle of trees and vines. Creatures are much more dangerous. At it's deepest point, the updraft causes water to flow upwards, and trees grow upside down. Home of the Seeker Camp, a rest stop run by Ozen and her crew. Most travel overland, or over bridges suspended between trees

5.content:
Attributes: Sheer cliff, rocky, tunnels, windy, spikes
The Third Layer of the Abyss. A 4,000 km vertical cliff, with spikes that extend towards the bottom.  A large cave system passes through the walls. Inhabited by dangerous flying and subterranean creatures.

6.content:
Attributes: Wet, dark, pools, deadly
The Forth layer of the abyss. A humid jungle where plants grow large bowls to catch water.  Nicknamed "The Goblets of Giants". Monsters here are extremely dangerous.

7.content:
attributes: Sandy, salty water, flat, flooded
The thinnest layer of the Abyss vertically, being only 1,000 meters deep, very wide horizontally. It consists mostly of a large, monster-filled sea with some crystallized sections, held up by a thick layer of dense mud. This is the last layer of the Abyss where it is possible to bear the Curse and return alive and intact.  It's home to Bondrewd and his fort known as Ido Front.

8.content:
attributes: Safe, cozy, stores
Orth is a large town on the edge of the Abyss, formed as a result of the many explorers traveling to the abyss. Orth has 5 districts: Central, North, West, South, and East. Delvers use it to restock and sell relics they find. In the center of the City is a golden gondala, which gives direct access to the second layer.

9.content:
attributes: Adventurous, dangerous, curious, violent
Delvers are people who delve into the abyss, for relics or knowledge about it's secrets. They carry backpacks full of gear, and most carry a pickaxe.  They wear whistles to signify rank. Ordered from lowest to highest, they are: red, blue, purple, black, white

10.content:
attributes: Legendary, capable, powerful, unethical
White whistles are legends of the Abyss. They carry many power relics, and know the abyss better then anyone. They are far stronger then anyone except other white whistles. Only five currently exist:
Lyza "The Annihilator"
Ozen "The Immovable"
Bondrewd "The Novel"
Srajo "The Mysterious"
Wakuna "The Chosen"

Breathe close enough to feel their breath hitch. Notice how the skin might change color as it flushes, or how it feels under the partner's hands.
